getPopupMenu

public javax.swing.JPopupMenu getPopupMenu(PropertySheet ps,
                                           CH.ifa.draw.framework.DrawingView view)
Get the popup menu for this connection. Put here all the popup menu items common to all the connections; override this method to differentiate the menu items.

Parameters:
ps - the property sheet to use in the Properties option.
Returns:
the popup menu.
